channel.title: Evernote on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Evernote on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Digital Fine Print
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: You know who’s had a bad week? The folks at Evernote. They’ve been raked over the coals by their users over a change to their privacy policy, that document on nearly every webpage that most people don’t really read unless they’re bored. Well … someone read Evernote’s policy and found out that they were going to let engineers have access to user notes in an anonymized fashion.
